name: 真乃
text:
あ、灯織ちゃんっ
お疲れさま
trans: Ah, Hiori, thanks for your hard work.

name: 真乃
text: ……灯織ちゃんも、ミルクティーだ

name: 灯織
text: 真乃、それ、ちゃんとあったかいやつ？
trans: Mano, did you make sure that's a warm one?

name: 真乃
text: ふふっ、めぐるちゃんっ

name: めぐる
text: あー！　ふたりだけ何か飲もうとしてる！
trans: Ah! The two of you are drinking something all by yourselves!

name: めぐる
text:
ずるいんだー！
わたしも欲しいよー
trans: No fair! I want one too!

name: 灯織
trans: You're having milk tea too, Meguru?

name: めぐる
text: えへへっ、だってふたりとも持ってるんだもん！
trans: Ehehe, I mean the two of you are having it too!

name: 真乃
text: ふふっ、めぐるちゃん手袋してないから……
trans: Fufu, it's because Meguru's not wearing gloves.

name: 灯織
trans: Want to take a stroll as it cools?

name: めぐる
text: えっ、いいの？　じゃあ、河原の方から回っていこうよ！
trans: Eh, are you sure? Then, let's go over by the river!

name: めぐる
text: うわぁ、なんだかいつもより水が多いねー
trans: Wow, there's more water than usual for some reason.

name: 灯織
text: 時期的に、雪解け水かな
trans: Going by the season, I'm guessing it's meltwater.

name: めぐる
text:
これ、雪だった水なんだ……！
冷たそうー！
trans: So this water used to be snow! Seems cold!

name: 真乃
text:
あの、あそこ……
群れで飛んでる鳥さんたち……
trans: Umm, over there... the birds that are flying in a flock...

name: めぐる
text:
わーっ！　いっぱいいる！
コガモっていうんだ
trans: Wow! There's a bunch of them! So they're called Eurasian teals!

name: 真乃
text:
コガモさんたち、
きっと北の方へ帰る練習をしてるの
trans: The Eurasian teals must be practicing to fly back north.

name: 灯織
trans: I see, it's because they're migratory birds.

name: 真乃
text:
若いコガモさんは、春までいっぱい練習してきて
これから本番なんだ
trans: The young Eurasian teals practice a lot throughout spring. Soon it'll be the main event.

name: めぐる
text: あっ、北海道とかまで行くんでしょ！？
trans: Ah, they'll be going over to places like Hokkaido right!?

name: 灯織
text:
もっと遠くまで行く鳥もいるって、聞いたことある
たぶん、シベリアとか……
trans: I heard that there are birds that go even farther. I'm guessing, to places like Siberia...

name: 真乃
text:
うん。時々お休みしながら、
ずっとずっと、飛んでいくの
trans: Yes, they rest occasionally, but they keep on flying.

name: めぐる
text: …………そ、それじゃ、すっごく頑張らなきゃね……！
trans: ...I-In that case, they must really do their best!

name: 灯織
text:
……あっ、あの子
ちょっと遅れてる……！
trans: ...Ah, that little one. It's falling behind!

name: めぐる
text:
わっ、ほんとだ……！
……落ちちゃいそうじゃない！？
trans: Ah, you're right! .. Doesn't it look like it's about to fall!?

name: 真乃
text:
まだ、あんまり慣れてないみたい……
──頑張って……！
trans: It looks like it's still inexperienced... Do your best...!

name: めぐる
trans: Do your best, do your best!

name: 灯織
text: よかった……持ち直したみたい！
trans: I'm glad... Seems like it managed to recover!

name: めぐる
text:
うんっ！　ちゃんと飛んでるよ！
みんなと一緒に！
trans: Yeah! It's flying properly now! With everyone else!

name: めぐる
text: コガモさーん！　頑張ってーっ！

name: めぐる
text: きっと、もっと飛べるようになるよーっ！
trans: You'll definitely be able to fly even better!

name: 真乃
text:
……ふふっ
灯織ちゃん、めぐるちゃん

name: 真乃
text:
あの……
隣にいてくれて、ありがとう
trans:
Umm...
Thanks for being by my side.

name: 真乃
text: 私も、ふたりの隣で、頑張るね
trans: I'll do my best too, being by your side.

name: 真乃
text: この日のためだったって、思えるように
trans: For the sake of this day, I want to think of it like that.
